bill.summary: 5/28/2004--Public Law. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to revise a specified repayment contract with the Tom Green County Water Control and Improvement District No. 1 by extending the period for repayment of the San Angelo, Texas, project's reimbursable construction costs from 40 to 50 years.
